FuncDef: This command enables the collection of statistics on the SAP or MPLS SDP binding on which the ETH- LMM test is configured. The collection of LMM statistics must be enabled if a MEP is launching or responding to ETH-LMM packets. If LMM statistics collection is not enabled, the counters in the LMM and LMR PDU do not represent accurate measurements and all measurements should be ignored. Theshow sap-using eth-cfm collect-lmm-statscommand and theshow sdp-using eth-cfm collect-lmm-stats commandcan be used to display which entities are collecting stats.
